input_args.passage: "Ex-RPGNet Review – Orkworld | John Wick writes that, “when it comes down to it, every game system resolves two things: 1) picking locks, and 2) hitting things.” I think that's probably ..."
input_args.claim: 'Hence, there is no common genre between the RPG "Orkworld" and the movie "John Wick" as one is a fantasy role-playing game and the other is a Neo-noir action thriller.'
